onClick(View) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.nasaapod.controller.HistoryFragment
Handles a click on a View in the RecyclerView by extracting the Apod reference returned by View.getTag(), showing the image fragment, invoking ImageFragment.setApod(Apod), and finally updating the BottomNavigationView in NavActivity.
